text: Kołobrzeg (; ) is a port city in the West Pomeranian Voivodeship in northwestern Poland. About 47,000 people live there. Its area is 25.67 km². Kołobrzeg is on the Parsęta River on the south coast of the Baltic Sea. It is a famous spa town. Kołobrzeg joined the Hanseatic League in 1361. title: Kołobrzeg
